```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(pixiedust)

(x <- data.frame(
  left = c("row 1", "row 2", "row 3", "row 4"),
  col1 = c(1, paste0(rep("This is a longer string of text to test multicolumn", 14), collapse = " "), 
           "This text should not appear when multirow works correctly",
           "something different"),
  col2 = c(2, 2, 2, 2), 
  col3 = c(3, 3, 3, 3),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>%
  dust() %>%
  sprinkle(rows = 2:3, cols = 2:4, merge = TRUE,
           halign = "left", valign = "bottom",
           font_color = "Blue") %>%
  sprinkle(rows = 2, height = 2, height_units = "in") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 2, width = 250, width_units = "pt") %>%
  sprinkle(bg_pattern_by = "rows") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("latex"))
```
